Course Description: THE STUDENT WILL USE COMPUTER SOFTWARE AND FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING APPLICATIONS TO ANALYZE ACCOUNTING RECORDS AND PREPARE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE STUDENT WILL LEARN, WITH TUTORIAL HELP AND PROBLEM-SOLVING, THE CONCEPTS NEEDED TO ACHIEVE THE OBJECTIVES OF ACG2021.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major:
COMPETENCY 1: THE STUDENT WILL REINFORCE AND APPLY THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF ANALYZING AND RECORDING FINANCIAL TRANSACTIONS BY:
1. ENTERING JOURNAL ENTRIES IN A COMPUTERIZED GENERAL LEDGER SOFTWARE.
 
COMPETENCY 2: THE STUDENT WILL REINFORCE AND APPLY THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF THE ACCOUNTING CYCLE BY:
1. PERFORMING ALL OF THE STEPS OF THE ACCOUNTING CYCLE IN A COMPUTERIZED GENERAL LEDGER SOFTWARE.
 
COMPETENCY 3: THE STUDENT WILL COMPLETE A SET OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND ANALYZE THEIR CONTENT BY:
1. ANALYZING THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT REPORTS GENERATED FROM A COMPUTERIZED GENERAL LEDGER SOFTWARE.
 
COMPETENCY 4: THE STUDENT WILL UTILIZE EXCEL SPREADSHEET SOFTWARE BY:2. NUMBERS / DATA
1. PREPARING SPREADSHEETS FROM FINANCIAL STATEMENT DATA, SUCH AS AGING SCHEDULES, DEPRECIATION SCHEDULES, AND PAYROLL SCHEDULES.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
